plot: 10 years ago Kiefer Donovan gave the world his solution to Global Warming...but he lost the Nobel Prize and nobody cared. We meet Kiefer working at a community college, on a day that will change his life.
title: I Saved the World from Global Warming!
plot_es: 10 years ago Kiefer Donovan gave the world his solution to Global Warming...but he lost the Nobel Prize and nobody cared. We meet Kiefer working at a community college, on a day that will change his life.
